IKP.name: Identity, Key Management & Privacy
IKP.description: Focuses on identity management, key management strategies, and privacy-preserving technologies

Cyber Security.name: Cybersecurity Working Group
Cyber Security.description: Addresses security frameworks, threat intelligence, and cybersecurity standards for blockchain systems

FACE.name: Financial Applications & Social Economics
FACE.description: Examines financial applications, stablecoins, and socio-economic impacts of blockchain technology

Gov Hack.name: Governance Hackathon
Gov Hack.description: Hackathon sessions focused on government and policy applications of blockchain

instructions.note: Please fill in the session details for each day. You can add or remove session objects as needed.
instructions.id: Use a unique identifier for each session (e.g., 'day1-session1', 'day1-ikp-offline-key')
instructions.room: Use the exact room names from the 'rooms' section (e.g., 'HFSC Herman Meeting Room', 'Arrupe Hall', 'Hariri 140', etc.)
instructions.wg: Use one of: IKP, Cyber Security, FACE, Gov Hack, General
instructions.optional_fields: speakers, moderator fields are optional - leave empty string if not applicable
instructions.detailPage: Path for the individual session detail page - format: /events/20251015-block13/sessions/[session-id]
instructions.agenda: Array of agenda items for the session detail page
instructions.documents: Array of related documents with title, link, and type
instructions.relatedProjects: Array of project IDs from the critical projects section that relate to this session
instructions.parallel_sessions: If sessions run in parallel (same time, different rooms), just add them as separate entries with the same time

sorting_behavior.by_time: Sessions will be displayed chronologically, grouped by time slots
sorting_behavior.by_room: Sessions will be grouped by room/venue, with the venue image displayed at the top of each room group

session_detail_pages.description: Each session can link to a dedicated detail page that includes:
contents: Full session information (time, location, working group)
